pullrequest.title: Check for DRI capable display in cmake

content.raw:
@gerkey very good catch about using the PROJECT will break PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR. It was hidden other more important bug. This is much cleaner approach depending only in RESULT from python and not parsing output errors.

Mental note: beware of cmake cache when using FIND_PROGRAM.
